comments.raw_text: Unlike IMAP, all of our state is stored fully locally, so we really lose it when we delete it (IMAP lets the server hold on to it for a bit longer). We could probably keep the state around in the undo manager, but I shudder to think what would happen if you have offline bodies that we need to keep around...
